page.title: 06CRIME IN DARLINGTON
page.content: On average there are 100 petty crimes and 7 serious crimes committed a week, which is about average for towns of this size. Commonest drug problem in Darlington is Cannabis,18 arrests have been made in four months. Two arrests have been made for possesing Amphetamines and Barbiturates.Seven men work for Durham Drug Squad. In the past 14 years crime has increased by 4,223 and roughly 42% of crimes are solved. In Darlington there are three Magistrates' courtrooms which are open three days a week for adults and three for juveniles. Last year the figures for road accidents were _ 7 fatal, 105 serious, 330 slight injuries, 508 damage accidents and 111 dogs killed or injured, making a total of 919.
